summary: A physicist is a scientist who studies physics.
full_text:
A physicist is a scientist who specializes in physics research. Physicists study a wide range of physical phenomena in many branches of physics spanning all length scales: from sub-atomic particles of which all ordinary matter is made  to the behavior of the material Universe as a whole .
The term "physicist" was coined by William Whewell in his 1840 book The Philosophy of the Inductive Sciences.
title: Physicist
